select sysUser.id, sysUser.user_account, sysUser.user_pass, sysUser.delete_flag, sysUser.created_time, sysUser.update_time from sys_user sysUser where sysUser.delete_flag = 0
and sysUser.user_account like '%${ condition.userAccount }%'

select sysRole.id, sysRole.role_namey, sysRole.role_namez from sys_user sysUser left join sys_user_role userRole on sysUser.id = userRole.user_id and userRole.delete_flag = 0 left join sys_role sysRole on userRole.role_id = sysRole.id and sysRole.delete_flag = 0 where sysUser.delete_flag = 0 and sysUser.id = #{ condition }
